co.paralleluniverse.strands.channels

Class DelayedVal<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.strands.channels.DelayedVal<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<V>

    public class DelayedVal<V>
extends Object
implements Future<V>

    Represents a delayed value that can be set at most once, and when read, blocks until a value has been set.

    • Constructor Summary

      • get

        @Suspendable
public V get(long timeout,
                TimeUnit unit)
      throws InterruptedException,
             TimeoutException

        Returns the delayed value, blocking until it has been set, but no longer than the given timeout.

        Specified by:
        get in interface Future<V>
        Parameters:
        timeout - The maximum duration to block waiting for the value to be set.
        unit - The time unit of the timeout value.
        Returns:
        the value
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if the timeout expires before the value is set.
